pullRequest.title: OpenSslSession.getLocalCertificates() and  getLocalPrincipal() must r…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…eturn null on client side if mTLS is not used
Motivation:
OpenSslSession.getLocalCertificates() and  getLocalPrincipal() must return null on client side if mTLS is not used as stated in the API documentation. At the moment this is not always the case
Modifications:

Ensure we only return non-null if mTLS is used
Add unit tests

Result:
Follow SSLSession API contract

commit.message:
OpenSslSession.getLocalCertificates() and  getLocalPrincipal() must return null on client side if mTLS is not used

Motivation:

OpenSslSession.getLocalCertificates() and  getLocalPrincipal() must return null on client side if mTLS is not used as stated in the API documentation. At the moment this is not always the case

Modifications:

- Ensure we only return non-null if mTLS is used
- Add unit tests

Result:

Follow SSLSession API contract
